main event: U.S. Coast Guard personnel reported sighting a spherical object emitting a red glow over Port O'Connor, Texas on August 2, 1949.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 4 to 5 minutes,It appeared almost stationary with occasional slight movements to the North,The object was estimated to be at an altitude of around 3000 feet,Multiple U.S. Coast Guard personnel witnessed the sighting,There was no sound reported from the object and no trails were sighted.
sighted object: spherical object emitting a red glow
